## Description {#details}

This pass does misc.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> optimizations on IR <em>just</em> before instruction selection.

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;Optimize&quot; the virtual regs that cross basic block boundaries. When</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// building the SelectionDAG, vectors of illegal types that cross basic blocks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be scalarized and widened, with each scalar living in its</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// own register. To work around this, this optimization converts the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectors to equivalent vectors of legal type (which are converted back</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// before uses in subsequent blocks), to pack the bits into fewer physical</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers (used in CopyToReg/CopyFromReg pairs).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
